## NULL

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

nycflights13::flights %>%
 mutate(
 cancelled = is.na(dep_time),
 sched_hour = sched_dep_time %/% 100,
 sched_min = sched_dep_time %% 100,
 sched_dep_time = sched_hour + sched_min / 60
 ) %>%
 ggplot(mapping = aes(sched_dep_time)) +
 geom_freqpoly(
 mapping = aes(color = cancelled),
 binwidth = 1/4
 )

```
